official-title.#text:
To repeal a certain rule relating to nutrition standards
		  in the national school lunch and school breakfast programs, and for other
		  purposes.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Education and the
			 Workforce

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
relating to
			 nutrition standards in the national school lunch and school breakfast programs
			 published on January 26, 2012 (77 Fed. Reg. 4088 et seq.) and revising parts
			 210 and 220 of title 7, Code of Federal Regulations, shall have no force or
			 effect.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Food and Nutrition Service of the Department of Agriculture

quote.#text:
, to establish a calorie
			 maximum for individual school lunches, or to prohibit a child from eating a
			 lunch provided by the child’s parent or legal guardian

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by
			 inserting before the semicolon the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 9(a)(1)(A)(i) of the Richard B.
			 Russell National School Lunch Act
